content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you could make it. The apartment is indeed a prime location with all the amenities nearby. Let's discuss the rent. What is your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student, so I am on a tight budget. I was hoping for something around 350 euros a month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that is much lower than my expectations. The location and quality of the apartment justify a higher price. Would you be willing to pay 500 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but 500 euros is too high for me. I can offer 425 euros. I hope we can find a solution.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 425 euros is still below my asking price. How about we meet in the middle at 475 euros? This is a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your fairness. I agree to the price of 475 euros a month!
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 475 euros a month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
